Narr_GTtoSdR5U02veCQj-LYheg.value: As part of the hive-down, the parent company changed its name from “HELLENIC PETROLEUM S.A.” to “HELLENIC PETROLEUM Holdings S.A.”

Narr_5IkLwVDiDkubJhrLPsodrg.value: The Group’s activities include refining and marketing of oil products, production and marketing of petrochemical products and electricity generation through renewable energy sources. The Group is also active in exploration for hydrocarbons and provides engineering services. Through its investments in DEPA Commercial, DEPA International Projects and Elpedison B.V., the Group also operates in the natural gas sector and in electricity generation (through gas-fired units) and trading.
